quote: I never lose in any argument, because I always make sure that my opponent wins.
author: Debasish Mridha, M.D.

quote: If there is no God, everything is permitted.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: Yearning is not only a good way to go crazy but also a pretty good place to hide out from hard truth.
author: Claude T Bissell

quote: Flattery may be considered as a mode of companionship, degrading but profitable to him who flatters.
author: Theophrastus

quote: You are who you are, and no one can change that. So be yourself, because no one can do it better.
author: Meylin D. Bojorge

quote: No matter how much you disagree with your kin, if you are a thoroughbred you will not discuss their shortcomings with the neighbors.
author: Tom Thompson
